name: Recycled Wrapper Ramen Noodle Purse Chicken Flavor
description:
For those who love chicken, a recyclized version of the cheapest, most filling food on the planet! Chicken Ramen noodle wrappers, cleverly redesigned into a great shoulder bag. Front pocket and velcro flap closure.

Purse measures 9.5" x 6.25" (24.1cm x 15.9 cm). Straps measure 24.5" (62.2 cm) long.


*disclaimer*
In case you're bugging out about the use of the wrappers, we are in no way affiliated with the company or its subsidiaries. We've found a better way to use disposed of food and beverage wrappers, saving them from the destined land-fills that so many other un-recyclable packaging find their demise.

name: Velcro Flap Ramen Noodle Purse Chicken Flavor
description:
Well known by college students, starving artists and those, like me, who just love the taste of the

RAMEN NOODLE Chicken Flavor

Made with Real Wrappers Recycled from Maruchan Noodle Wrappers


The handles are secured with #2 grommets for a stronger carry.

Measures 14" wide and 6" tall, 5" front 2-back

and two 18" handle made from laminated wrappers

Hard interior bottom


*disclaimer*
In case you're bugging out about the use of the wrappers, we are in no way affiliated with the company or its subsidiaries. We've found a better way to use disposed of food and beverage wrappers, saving them from the destined land-fills that so many other un-recyclable packaging find their demise.
Added on Oct 29, 2008

name: Pass the Puffs - Cheetos Flamin Hot Puffs Recycled Wrapper Mini Wallet
description:
Recycled Cheetos brand Flamin' Hot Puffs wrapper has been repurposed into a nice carry for ID, cash and credit card. Nice bold colors.

Measures 6.75" x 3.50"

Velcro closure.

name: Eye See Snacks - Recycled Potato Chip Wrapper Eyeglass Case
description:
Eye glass case in a little different eyeglass design. made from single recycled wrapper. Slip the spectacles into their felt-lined home in snack style! Made from recycled Salt n Vinegar wrappers - vinyl encased. Measures 6.5" long and 2.5" wide.


*disclaimer*
In case you're bugging out about the use of the wrappers, we are in no way affiliated with the company or its subsidiaries. We've found a better way to use disposed of food and beverage wrappers, saving them from the destined land-fills that so many other un-recyclable packaging find their demise.

name: Sling It Baby Doritos Cool Ranch Recycled Wrapper Purse
description:
Throw in a book, your wallet (see matching mini wallet on my web space!) water bottle and be on your tortilla way! Made completely of wrappers, the purse features a 49" strap edged in black, velcro flap closure D-ring for a sturdy carry and faux rhinestone for added sass.

Purse measures 7.5" X 13" wide.



*disclaimer*

In case you're bugging out about the use of the wrappers, we are in no way affiliated with the company or its subsidiaries. We just found a better way to use disposed of food and beverage wrappers. And, yes, we know that we're not the only geniuses to think of this. We're one of many other eco-thoughtful creative beings.
